Sentence.sentence: American parents, whether rich or poor, have similar expectations of their children despite different ways of parenting.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The report warnsthe picture on wages is likely to get worse this year despite indications of an economic rebound.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Only  13  percent  of  respondents said that they were interested in buying a smartwatch in 2016, for example – an increase of just  one percent from the previous year despite a year of high-profile launches.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: On the flip side, there are many forced riders, who are suffering from the climate change impacts despite  having scarcely contributed to the problem.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is worth promoting despite the risks involved.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite this problem, many students are still drawn to these institutions—and two-year schools in particular.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite mournful polar bears and charts showing carbon emissions soaring, most people find it hard to believe that global warming will affect them personally.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite clear signs of global warming it is not easy for most people to believe climate change will affect their own lives.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A flagship university in the South, the school graduates just 16 percent of its first-generation students, despite its overall graduation rate of 71 percent.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite its failure to shatter the glass ceiling,Sweden has one of the most powerful and innovative economies in the world.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Our society does not— despite rhetoric(说辞) to the contrary—put much value on raising children.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That seems like common sense, despite the multiple influences on becoming parents
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite the ease with which the rich can acquire almost anything they desire, they are just as likely to be unhappy as the middle classes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite bottoming out in 1933, the Depression didn't end until World War II.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite this fact, many Americans are still strongly opposed to "big government.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite the modesty of the benefit, the Chamber of Commerce and other business groups fought it bitterly, describing it as "government-run personnel management" and a "dangerous precedent".
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite unemployment and the lost of her home, Andrea Clark considers herself a blessed and happy woman.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite arguments and disagreements, the movement has continued to flourish and has members in more than 80 countries.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: American universities, despite their global reputation for excellence in teaching, have only begun to demonstrate what they can produce in real-world learning.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Despite being the continent's second-largest producer of tomatoes, Nigeria is dependent on $1 billion worth of tomato-paste imports every year, as around 75% of the local harvest goes to waste thanks to a lack of proper storage facilities.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Despite complications and concerns, the upsides of sharing can be significant.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Despite the success of the experiment, the actual results are worrisome, and mostly confirm earlier studies.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Despite the turmoil, brick and mortar won't disappear any time soon.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Despite this problem, many students are still drawn to these institutions — and two-year schools in particular.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: However, despite 2 billion people worldwide already supplementing their diet with insects, consumer disgust remains a large barrier in many western countries.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In the flip side, there are many "forced riders", who are suffering from the climate change impacts despite having scarcely contributed to the problem.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: In the United States, up to forty percent of all food goes uneaten, despite the fact that one in seven American households lacks regular access to good food.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Only 13 percent of respondents said that they were interested in buying a smartwatch in 2016, for example – an increase of just one percent from the previous year despite a year of high-profile launches.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: So, despite all the talk about drone deliveries to your doorstep, all the retail executives expressing anxiety over consumers going online, and even a Presidential candidate exclaiming that Amazon has a " huge antitrust problem, " the Census data suggest
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The report warns the picture on wages is likely to get worse this year despite indications of an economic rebound.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词或前置短语都含有"虽然，尽管"之意。
means: despite ： 书面用词，指不受某事或某种原因的阻碍，语气轻于in spite of。
in spite of ： 在这些词中语气最强，可与despite换用，口语或书面语中均可使用。
notwithstanding ： 语气最弱，仅表示一种障碍的存在。

stems_affixes.word_buile: con大家+spic看+uous……的→大家都看见→显眼的
de向下+spic看+able能……的→能向下看的→可鄙视的
per全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼
sus下面+spic看+ious……的→在下面看的→suspicious怀疑的
suspicious[adj.[of]可疑的,多疑的,疑心的]+ly表副词→adv.猜疑着, 怀疑着
sus下面+spic看+ion表名词→在下面看→suspicion怀疑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不管, 尽管, 不论
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+spite=spic看→不看→不管, 尽管

Sentence.sentence: And their minds are bright despite their dirty hands and clothes.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite recent advancements in 3D food printing, the industry has many challenges to overcome.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite the pain, I stayed the course walking a bit and then running again.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite the poor service of the hotel, the manager is reluctant to invest in sufficient training for his staff.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite the previous rounds of talks, no agreement has been reached so far by the two sides.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite the serious nature of inspections, they resulted in some funny moments.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite their many differences, all human beings share several defining characteristics.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: He sensed a great potential in her despite her weaknesses.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: I learned through another woman's eyes that my daughter was still a good person despite her troubled teenage years.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: In any case, despite so much evidence to the contrary, many managers still agree to theory X.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语上海卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The reason why the ponies here are naughty is that Haytor is a tourist-heavy area and tourists are constantly feeding the ponies foods, despite signs asking them not to.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The thing is, a number of them have admitted that despite their success, they aren't happy.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: This is despite evidence that a dollar spent on risk-reduction saves at least two on reconstruction.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Thus humans who lived a million years ago, despite their big brains and sharp stone tools, lived in constant fear of meat-eating animals.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 任务型阅读 原文

Sentence.sentence: More recently, while examining housing construction, the researchers discovered that illiterate, non-English- speaking Mexican workers in Houston, Texas, consistently met best-practice labor productivity standards despite the complexity of the building industry’s work.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In 2005, IBM noted in a court filing that it had been issued more than 300 business-method patents despite the fact that it questioned the legal basis for granting them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite variations in detail, wholesale markets in the countries that have been closely examined— France, Germany, Italy and Spain—are made out of the same building blocks.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite these factors, many social scientists seem reluctant to tackle such problems.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, despite years in the making, “The Heart of the Matter” never gets to the heart of the matter: the illiberal nature of liberal education at our leading colleges and universities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If everything was going so well, then why did over 17 million people vote for Brexit, despite the warnings about what it could do to their country’s economic prospects?.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But despite common misconceptions, a gap year does not hinder the success of academic pursuits—in fact, it probably enhances it.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But—despite some claims to the contrary, laughing probably has little influence on physical fitness.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Despite attempts by the Church to strong-arm this new generation of logicians and rationalists, more explanations for how the universe functioned were being made, and at a rate that the people-including the Church -could no longer ignore.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Despite graduating into the best economy in the past 50 years, Gen Zs know what an economic train wreck looks like.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Despite the appeals court's decision, big questions remain unanswered.
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Despite trade competition and outsourcing, American manufacturing still needs to replace tens of thousands of retiring boomers every years.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Despite variations in detail, wholesale markets in the countries that have been closely examined—France, Germany, Italy and Spain—are made out of the same building blocks.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In 2005, IBM noted in a court filing that it had been issued more than 300 business-method patents, despite the fact that it questioned the legal basis for granting them.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Mayor Jose Luis Martinez-Almeida made opposition to the zone a centrepiece of his election campaign, despite its success in improving air quality.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The Dutch giant Elsevier, which claims to publish 25% of the scientific papers produced in the world, made profits of more than £900m last year, while UK universities alone spent more than £210m in 2016 to enable researchers to access their own publicly f
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 不管, 尽管, 任凭

sentences.en: Despite the fact that she is short, she is an excellent basketball player.
sentences.cn: 尽管她个子矮, 却是个出色的篮球运动员。

means.word_mean: 尽管（自己）不愿意  Alternate: despite yourself
侮辱，凌辱；损害；伤害；卑鄙的行为；不利

jx.jx_en_mean: used to indicate that one did not intend or expect to do the thing mentioned
jx.jx_cn_mean: 不由自主地；身不由己地

lj.lj_ly: despite herself Fran felt a ripple of appreciation for his beauty.
lj.lj_ls: 弗兰不由自主地感受到了他的勃勃英姿。

entry.def: You use despite to introduce a fact which makes the other part of the sentence surprising.

example.ex: Despite a thorough investigation, no trace of Dr Southwell has been found...
example.tran: 尽管进行了彻底的调查，还是没有发现索思韦尔博士的任何踪迹。

example.ex: The National Health Service has visibly deteriorated, despite increased spending...
example.tran: 尽管支出在增加，但国民医疗保健服务的质量却明显下降了。

entry.def: If you do something despite yourself you do it although you did not really intend or expect to.

example.ex: Despite myself, Harry's remarks had caused me to stop and reflect.
example.tran: 哈里的话让我不由自主地停下来细想。

means.word_mean: 1. lack of respect accompanied by a feeling of intense dislike;

sentences.sentence: "the despite in which outsiders were held is legendary"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (originally used as a noun meaning contempt, scorn in the phrase in despite of): from Old French despit, from Latin despectus 'looking down on', past participle (used as a noun) of despicere (see despise)

sentences.cn: 他不想笑，但还是忍不住笑了出来。
sentences.en: He had to laugh despite himself.

sentences.cn: 尽管她竭尽全力控制自己，声音仍然在颤抖。
sentences.en: Her voice was shaking despite all her efforts to control it.

sentences.cn: 尽管他申请了数百个工作，但仍然在失业中。
sentences.en: Despite applying for hundreds of jobs, he is still out of work.

sentences.cn: 尽管她认为物理枯燥无味，她却学得很好。
sentences.en: She was good at physics despite the fact that she found it boring.

sentences.cn: 哈里的话让我不由自主地停下来细想。
sentences.en: Despite myself, Harry's remarks had caused me to stop and reflect.

sentences.cn: 尽管支出在增加，但国民医疗保健服务的质量却明显下降了。
sentences.en: The National Health Service has visibly deteriorated, despite increased spending...

sentences.cn: 尽管进行了彻底的调查，还是没有发现索思韦尔博士的任何踪迹。
sentences.en: Despite a thorough investigation, no trace of Dr Southwell has been found...

sentences.cn: 空闲时你喜欢干什么?
sentences.en: What do you like to do in your spare time?

sentences.cn: 尽管她衣衫褴褛, 但神态老练世故.
sentences.en: Despite her scruffy clothes, there was an air of sophistication about her.

sentences.cn: 生意虽然开始时很成功,但终于失败了.
sentences.en: The business folded up despite its brave start.

sentences.cn: 尽管有严厉的遏制措施,人口还是在全面增长.
sentences.en: There has been an overall growth in population, despite some draconian efforts to contain it.

sentences.cn: 尽管身体残疾,她却是个游泳好手.
sentences.en: She swims well despite her disabilities.

sentences.cn: 他虽然遇到许多挫折,可是意志仍旧那样坚强.
sentences.en: His determination remains as strong as ever despite all the setbacks he has encountered.

sentences.cn: 尽管能见度极差,飞机由雷达导航返航了.
sentences.en: The pilot homed in by means of radar, despite the poor visibility.

sentences.cn: 桥尽管很大, 但它结构简单,而外形雅观, 实现了设计师要创造出 “ 一个在重物作用下尽可能不变形的庞然大物”的理想.
sentences.en: Despite its immensity, it is both simple and elegant, fulfilling its designer's dream to create'an enormous object drawn as faintly as possible.

sentences.cn: 不管有什么困难,我们一定会胜利.
sentences.en: We shall be victorious in despite of difficulties.

sentences.cn: 她虽然是个大明星，却非常平易近人。
sentences.en: Despite being a big star, she's very approachable.

sentences.cn: 尽管在经济方面有改善的迹象，但仍不容自满。
sentences.en: Despite signs of an improvement in the economy, there is no room for complacency.

sentences.cn: 尽管他身形庞大，移动起来还是很灵巧。
sentences.en: Despite his bulk he moved lightly on his feet.

sentences.cn: 虽然天气越来越热，他们仍全部戴着高顶礼帽，穿着燕尾服。
sentences.en: They were all in top hats and cutaways despite the growing heat.

sentences.cn: 虽然选举之前有过暴力事件，但有报道称投票过程秩序井然，波澜不惊。
sentences.en: Despite the violence that preceded the elections, reports say that polling was orderly and peaceful.

sentences.cn: 虽然其速度和安全性都可得到证明，但这种船还是不受欢迎。
sentences.en: Despite its demonstrable speed and safety, the boat failed to become popular.

sentences.cn: 尽管偶尔出现一些小的磕碰，美国和老挝一直保持着很友好的关系。
sentences.en: Despite the occasional hiccup, the US and Laos have had quite cordial relations.

sentences.cn: 我真的滑冰了——尽管有些踉跄，但没有跌跟头。
sentences.en: I actually skated, and despite some teetering I did not fall on the ice.

sentences.cn: 尽管进行了彻底的调查，还是没有发现索思韦尔博士的任何踪迹。
sentences.en: Despite a thorough investigation, no trace of Dr Southwell has been found.

sentences.cn: 显然，尽管监禁多年，他依旧保持着身体健康。
sentences.en: He'd obviously kept himself fit despite his years of confinement.

sentences.cn: 尽管天气一会儿好一会儿差，我们仍然度过了一个美好的周末。
sentences.en: Despite the unsettled weather, we had a marvellous weekend.

sentences.cn: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。
sentences.en: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.

sentences.cn: 接着要忍耐, 在你引人注目的同时, 不管批评者如何挑剔,坚持下来.
sentences.en: Then stick with it, despite the critics, as you gain traction.

sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 我们的女儿仍然爱我,并希望我坚定立场.
sentences.en: Despite everything, our daughter still loved me and wanted me to stand my ground.

sentences.cn: 不管她说什么,我一声不吭,没有被激怒.
sentences.en: Despite what she said I buttoned my lip and refused to be provoked.

sentences.cn: 不管是多么普及的节奏同步延迟(就是广泛使用), 他们都不可能适应如何歌曲.
sentences.en: Despite the popularity of rhythmically timed delays, they don't benefit every song.

sentences.cn: 她说, 不管新的自由, 政府的官僚主义仍然给企业家带来了困难.
sentences.en: Despite new freedoms, she says, that government bureaucracy still makes it hard to be entrepreneur.

sentences.cn: 不管发生什么样的挫折和不愉快的事情, 请微笑面对.
sentences.en: Despite any frustration or unpleasant might happen, please smile to yourself.

sentences.cn: 在这里,不管天气有多糟,丹麦人都知道如何生活.
sentences.en: Over here The Danish know how to keep on despite the weather.

sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 许多入室盗窃行为都是经由前门进行的.
sentences.en: Despite everything, a lot of burglaries are still carried out via the front door.

sentences.cn: 不管他嘴上如何说, 你知道那晚他并不高兴和你在一起.
sentences.en: Despite what he says, you know he is not glad to be there with you.

sentences.cn: 不管我能力多么有限, 但我会尽全力的.
sentences.en: Despite my limited means, I will do my best.

sentences.cn: 不管稳健的财务表现和激进的股票回购, 易趣公司股票已经下挫.
sentences.en: Despite solid financial performance and an aggressive stock buyback, eBay stock has been flagging.

sentences.cn: 他们坚持自己的计划,不管那些反对意见.
sentences.en: They are sticking by their plans despite all the opposition.

sentences.cn: 不管它们的语法, 成员对象类型的指针可以被视为解引用功能.
sentences.en: Despite their syntax, pointer to member object types can be seen as dereferencing functionals.

sentences.cn: 不管是哪一种,也不管最后的结果是什么样的, 这种刻骨铭心的感觉真的很好.
sentences.en: Whatever the situation, and despite the ending, it's really nice to have this kind of feelings.

sentences.cn: 证明存在相互关联是很容易的, 但证明有因果关系则不然——不管其间的联系是多么明显.
sentences.en: Proving correlation is easy, but proving causation — despite how obvious the links may seem — is not.

sentences.cn: 不管凯斯勒怎样喊叫,怎样哭闹, 这两名助手还是把他的破旧家俱一件件搬下来.
sentences.en: Despite Kessler's wailing and carrying on, the two assistants methodically removed his meager furniture.

sentences.cn: 不管有多混乱, 这位狂热的购物者总会从容不迫地去购物.
sentences.en: And despite the pandemonium, the avid shopper had taken his time to browse the shops.

sentences.cn: 不管出身和地位如何不同, 我们的生命都是等值的.
sentences.en: Despite different class and social status, our lives are of equal value.

sentences.cn: 不管他使用什么艺术语言,但他的主题是描写失业者的困境.
sentences.en: Despite all the rhetoric the real burden of his song concerned the plight of the unemployed.

sentences.cn: 难怪哈佛女孩, 不管它威严的表露, 而敲击出一个流行的和弦.
sentences.en: No wonder ( a? the? ) Harvard girl, despite its martial overtones, struck a popular chord.

sentences.cn: 孔雀不管大小, 都善于飞行,晚上在树上栖息.
sentences.en: Peafowl fly well despite their size, and roost in trees at night.

sentences.cn: 不管他们说什么, 我们的第一主角却依然保持沉默.
sentences.en: Despite all the talk around them, the principals in the saga remain quiet.

sentences.cn: 你能无止境地拥有爱,不管你的潜意识如何?
sentences.en: Despite what your subconscious may be telling you, you can have love with no limits.

sentences.cn: 不管争议如何, 卫生机构似乎同意研究人员可以继续进行异种移植,但要谨慎从事.
sentences.en: And despite all the controversy, health agencies seem content to let them proceed with caution.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 生命科学 - 医学的第四次革命

sentences.cn: 不管有什么困难,我们一定会胜利.
sentences.en: We shall be victorious in despite of difficulties.

sentences.cn: 除去缺少的信息不说,不管怎样, 你都可能会需要达成一个协议.
sentences.en: Despite missing information, it appears you will need to make an agreement anyway.

sentences.cn: 但不管怎么说, 他能遣词造句.
sentences.en: And yet , despite it all, he could use words.

sentences.cn: 不管他做过些什么,这番话听起来倒还很诚恳.
sentences.en: It'sounded sincere enough, however , despite all he had done.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 她不管遇到什么情况都竭力保持着幽默感.
sentences.en: She managed despite everything to preserve her sense of humour.

sentences.cn: 不管程序员水平有多高,多么的细心, 软件总会有错误.
sentences.en: Despite how competent the programmers are and how much care taken, always be software problems.

sentences.cn: 虽有雷雨, 驾驶员还是安全降落了.
sentences.en: Despite the thunderstorm, the pilot put down ( his plane ) in a perfect landing.

sentences.cn: 不过, 虽有相互往对方身后躲藏的防御策略, 无数的沙丁鱼还是被吃掉了.
sentences.en: Yet, despite their defensive strategy of hiding behind one another, millions of them get eaten.

sentences.cn: 尽管受到了侮辱,他还是按捺住怒气.
sentences.en: He possessed his temper despite the insult.

Sentence.sentence: Some scholars think teamwork may not always be reliable, despite its potential to work wonders.

Sentence.sentence: In the last year alone, despite an increase in the UK population and a subsequent rise in the number of households, sales of toilet paper fell by 2%, with the average household reducing their toilet roll spending from £43 in 2014 to £41 in 2015.

Sentence.sentence: We can live a peaceful life despite the various challenges of the modern world.
